fields.label: URL Structure
fields.message: http://www.site.com/branch/used-cars/?varible=value&varible2=value2 First varible starts with a ? and additional varible starts with a & examples make and model ?make=citroen ?make=citroen&model=c1 (model needs the make to work correctly) both make and model need to follow the slug from the taxonomy page (wp-admin/edit-tags.php?taxonomy=vehical_makes_and_models) examples bodystyle ?bodystyle=van ?bodystyle=hatchback,estate,saloon,coupe,convertible,mpv,suv (for more than one body style comma separate) examples other ?mileage=5000 (displays mileage up to 5000) acceptable values for mileage are 5000, 10000, 20000, 30000, 40000, 50000, 75000, 100000 ?age=2 (displays vehicles up to 2 years old) acceptable values for age are 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, over (over is for anything over 5 years old) These variables can be used to gether in any order http://www.site.com/branch/used-cars/?make=citroen&model=grand-c4-picasso&mileage=10000&age=2&bodystyle=mpv

fields.label: URL Structure
fields.message:
To display a selection of products in a 3 across grid. Use the any combination of the following options [shcms_featured_product

ids="product id/s comma separated" category="comma separated list of category slugs" featured="yes or no" per_page="the amount of products you want to display" orderby="date" order="desc or asc"

] Examples: Display products with IDs by data order: [shcms_featured_product ids="18408,18405,18259" orderby="date" order="desc"] Display all featured products: [shcms_featured_product featured="yes" orderby="date" order="desc" ] Display 4 products from the ds3 (slug) catagory: [shcms_featured_product category="ds3" per_page="4"] Display 9 products from the c1 and c3 catagory: [shcms_featured_product category="c1,c3" per_page="9"]
